title: Beech Chiropractic & Ayurvedic Health Centers | Autism Speaks
cleaned_text: Centers UPDATED: September 10, 2018 We offer Ayurvedic holistic care for Autistic individuals. - Languages: - English - Spanish - Malayallam - Insurances Accepted: - Call for Fee - No Insurance Accepted Address: 8218 Wisconsin Ave #302 [docbeech@mdofficemail.com](mailto:docbeech@mdofficemail.com) Contact: George Beech Our Autism Response Team (ART) is specially trained to connect people with autism, their families, and caretakers to information, tools, and resources.
